name: Imperial Star - Falcon Empire Wars
description:
Imperial Star - Falcon Empire Wars is an awesome space race game.

You’re a rebel that has been caught inside a fully operational battle station. You have a fast spaceship called Pie Fighter 314 and you must escape out of the battle station to hyperspace!

Traveling through hyperspace ain't like dusting crops, farm boy.

So you call your ship Imperial Star and the battle you’re involved in is called the Falcon Wars. Sometimes they’re called Millennium Wars but Falcon Wars sounds much better.

This battle station is placed in a galaxy far, far away… not really, is in a big star, as big as a planet with some smaller stars orbiting around. This star is right now the center of the falcon wars or millennium wars. The Empire (that’s what we call the bad guys) is trying to conquer all the planets in this system. After that they will expand to other systems and conquer other stars and so on… they want to conquer all the universe! That’s if we, the rebels, don’t stop them, of course.

Run through the battleship and space and see how far you can go in this awesome space race game.

The battle station is full of obstacles you should dodge and gold coins you should collect.
Use powerups to cheat death. Use the coins to upgrade the powerups, be a star and escape this spaceship in your pie fighter!

* Dash and dodge as fast as you can!
* Swipe to do lightning fast acrobatics!
* A fully operational battle station!
* Imperial Star! Falcon Wars!


This game is perfect for children, kids, boys, girls, adults and everyone!
